column1: Thank you so much for the scholarship, it really helped! However, I'm very disappointed that the alumni office never returned my calls about updating my address.
I appreciate the event invitation, but honestly the quality of speakers has really declined over the years.
Your staff was incredibly rude when I called yesterday. This is unacceptable.
Thank you for everything you do! The alumni network has been amazing.
Can you send me a copy of my transcript?
I love the new website design! But I'm frustrated that I can't find the donation page anywhere.
The scholarship program is wonderful, but the application process was confusing and poorly explained.
